Naga: Knowing him as I do, I think he will respect your freedom as 
long as you fulfill your duty. But remember that we are a faction at 
war, and we will need to fight.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord::
> 
> "If I join your faction"asked Windlord"What your Major will let me 
> do??? Will he let me freely fly around trusting in my loyalty or 
> not? "
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Naga: The more you keep asking questions, the more you are 
probable 
> > not to be able to leave. You are coming to know more and more 
about 
> > us. I suggest you join because otherwise, we will have to kill 
you. 
> We 
> > are members of the Tripredacus, a faction of transformers parallel 
> to 
> > the Predacons. This renegade jeopardizes our plans, thus we were 
> sent 
> > to take care of him. You look intelligent, Windlord, and someone 
> with 
> > a head is always welcome around here.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > Windlord::
> > > 
> > > "Predacons???"said Windlord"are more factions in this planet?"
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > Naga: Now, I feel that I can trust you, but if I am wrong, you 
> may 
> > > > regret it. In short, we are to neutralize a renegade Predacon.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Windlord::
> > > > > 
> > > > > "What cause?"asked Windlord.
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> 
> wrote:
> > > > > > He took Windlord in sight.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Naga: I am certain the Major would appreciate another one 
> to 
> > > our 
> > > > > > cause. You want to join?
